---------------------------------------------------------------------

When it comes to new surround-sound mixes, one name has become closely associated with the format: Steven Wilson. Keeper of the progressive- rock flame and frontman for Porcupine Tree, Wilson has in recent years created definitive 5.1 remixes for artists like King Crimson, Yes, XTC, Emerson, Lake and Palmer, Gentle Giant, and Jethro Tull.
Relayer arrives on the heels of other recent Yes reissues of The Yes Album and Close to the Edge. With just three lengthy tracks, Yes upped the free-form jazz quotient on Relayer without sacrificing the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s accessibility.

As on The Yes Album and Close to the Edge, the CD features WilsonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s new stereo mix. It also adds two single edits.
